#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 100003
#define eps  1e-9
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;


int64 logtable[1000006];
int main(){
	int t,n,i;
	long double sum=0;
	
	logtable[0]=1;
	logtable[1]=1;
	
	for(i=2;i<=1000000;i++){
	sum+=log10(i);
	logtable[i]=ceil(sum);}
	
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		printf("%lld\n",logtable[n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
